title: James A Garfield National Historic Site: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons         Front Door of the Garfield Home - start tours in the Visitor Center! NPS Staff  Summer through October 31 James A. Garfield National Historic Site is open daily from 10 a.m. to 5 p.m.  Check for updates on federal holidays; November 1 to April 30 James A. Garfield National Historic Site is open Fridays, Saturdays and Sundays only from 10 a.m. to 5 p.m. (closed Monday through Thursday). Adult and school groups may make reservations during the week by calling 440-255-8722 x225.  Holiday closures:   Thanksgiving Day Christmas Eve and Christmas Day New Years Day   Fee Free Days:  National Parks Week (Saturday, April 16-Sunday, April 17; Friday - Sunday April 22-24) National Park Service Birthday Weekend (August 25-28) National Public Lands Day (September 24)  The last house tour leaves at 4:15 p.m. daily. Tours may be limited.
